text.section: In this section, "health care facility" has the meaning stated in § 19-114 of this article.

Each health care facility shall provide each individual on admittance to the facility information concerning the rights of the individual to make decisions concerning health care, including the right to accept or refuse treatment, and the right to make an advance directive, including a living will.

section.section:
The information sheet developed by the Department under this subsection shall be provided by:
The Department, in accordance with § 15-109.1 of this article;
The Motor Vehicle Administration, in accordance with § 12-303.1 of the Transportation Article; and
A carrier, in accordance with § 15-122.1 of the Insurance Article.
The information sheet developed by the Department under this subsection may not contain or promote a specific advance directive form.
